content:
You are a civil engineer. You want to create a small scale drawing of a truss section of a bridge. The truss section is an isosceles trapezoid with parallel bases $22\text{ m}$ and $10\text{ m}$ and height $8\text{ m}$.

*An isosceles trapezoid has $4$ sides with $2$ parallel sides and $\,2$ nonparallel sides equal in length.*

**Create a scale drawing of the truss section using any scale of your choice.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
